languages.text: "Сами, конечно, тоже крови пролили. Гвоздь, вишь, геройских кровей оказался — на Бывалого прыгнул, завопил, толпу на бой поднял. Не выжил, конечно. Но мы уж усомнившихся да гостей подлых одолели".

"It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."
languages.original_text: "Сами, конечно, тоже крови пролили. Гвоздь, вишь, геройских кровей оказался — на Бывалого прыгнул, завопил, толпу на бой поднял. Не выжил, конечно. Но мы уж усомнившихся да гостей подлых одолели".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, they spilled some of our blood as well. Rivet was made of heroic stuff, he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't survive, of course, but we took down the doubters and the sneaky guests right there and then."

"Of course, they spilled some of our blood as well. Rivet was made of heroic stuff, he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't survive, of course, but we took down the doubters and the sneaky guests right there and then."

"Of course, they spilled some of our blood as well. Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He did not survive, of course, but we were able to eliminate the doubters and interlopers then and there."

"Of course, they spilled some of our blood as well. Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He did not survive, of course, but we were able to eliminate the doubters and interlopers then and there."

"It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

"It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

languages.text: «Nos ha salido caro, eso sí. Nuestro Remache actuó como un héroe: se abalanzó sobre Stager, gritó y animó a la gente a luchar. No sobrevivió, claro, pero gracias a él pudimos eliminar a los escépticos y a los rebeldes allí mismo».
languages.original_text: "It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

traits.locale_text: «Nos ha salido caro, eso sí. Nuestro Remache actuó como un héroe: se abalanzó sobre Stager, gritó y animó a la gente a luchar. No sobrevivió, claro, pero gracias a él pudimos eliminar a los escépticos y a los rebeldes allí mismo».

languages.text: 「しかし、その代償は大きかったです。彼はステージャーに飛びかかって叫び、群衆を戦いに駆り立てました。もちろん、ステージャーの作戦は失敗して、少なくとも、疑い深い人間と招かれざる客はその場で撃ち殺しました」
languages.original_text: "It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、その代償は大きかったです。彼はステージャーに飛びかかって叫び、群衆を戦いに駆り立てました。もちろん、ステージャーの作戦は失敗して、少なくとも、疑い深い人間と招かれざる客はその場で撃ち殺しました」

languages.text: “当然，我们这边也有伤亡。尖钉真是个好样的家伙，他扑向斯塔格，放声大吼，鼓励周围所有人参加战斗。当然，他没能干掉斯塔格，但至少给我们争取到了时间，我们当场击毙了那些怀疑分子和不速之客。”
languages.original_text: "It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

traits.locale_text: “当然，我们这边也有伤亡。尖钉真是个好样的家伙，他扑向斯塔格，放声大吼，鼓励周围所有人参加战斗。当然，他没能干掉斯塔格，但至少给我们争取到了时间，我们当场击毙了那些怀疑分子和不速之客。”

languages.text: "Aber es hat uns viel gekostet. Unser Bolzen war ein Held. Er ist auf Alter Hase zugestürmt, hat geschrien, hat die Menge angestachelt, zu kämpfen. Er hat natürlich nicht überlebt, aber zumindest haben wir die Zweifler und unsere ungebetenen Gäste gleich an Ort und Stelle erschossen."
languages.original_text: "It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

traits.locale_text: "Aber es hat uns viel gekostet. Unser Bolzen war ein Held. Er ist auf Alter Hase zugestürmt, hat geschrien, hat die Menge angestachelt, zu kämpfen. Er hat natürlich nicht überlebt, aber zumindest haben wir die Zweifler und unsere ungebetenen Gäste gleich an Ort und Stelle erschossen."

languages.text: « Après, je vous cacherai pas qu'on a beaucoup perdu dans le lot. Rivet avait l'étoffe d'un héros : il s'est jeté sur Stager en hurlant, et c'est ça qu'a poussé la foule à se battre. Il s'en est pas sorti, évidemment, mais au moins, comme ça, on a tout de suite pu faire le tri entre ceux qui doutaient et les autres, et on a abattu les sceptiques et les indésirables sur place. »
languages.original_text: "It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."

traits.locale_text: « Après, je vous cacherai pas qu'on a beaucoup perdu dans le lot. Rivet avait l'étoffe d'un héros : il s'est jeté sur Stager en hurlant, et c'est ça qu'a poussé la foule à se battre. Il s'en est pas sorti, évidemment, mais au moins, comme ça, on a tout de suite pu faire le tri entre ceux qui doutaient et les autres, et on a abattu les sceptiques et les indésirables sur place. »

languages.text: "Ama bedelini de ödedik. Bizim Rivet, tam kahraman çıktı. Eski Toprak'ın yakasına yapışıp narayı bastı, milleti galeyana getirdi. Sağ çıkamadı tabii ama en azından aklında şüphe olanları ve davetsiz misafirleri oracıkta vurabildik."
languages.original_text: "It cost us, though. Our Rivet was made of heroic stuff: he pounced on Stager, screamed, roused the crowd to a fight. He didn't make it, of course, but at least we shot the doubters and our unwanted guests then and there."
